name: 2019 – The Year That Was
author: Obot
description: A challenging, in-depth look at the events, pop culture, sports, science, and surprises that defined 2019. All questions are medium or hard—no easy points here!

rounds.theme_description: Major TV, film, and streaming moments of 2019.

questions.question: Which HBO series concluded in 2019 with a controversial final season that divided fans and critics alike?
questions.explanation: The eighth and final season of 'Game of Thrones' aired in 2019, sparking widespread debate over its ending.

questions.question: Which streaming service released the miniseries ‘When They See Us,’ based on the Central Park Five case, in 2019?
questions.explanation: Ava DuVernay’s ‘When They See Us’ premiered on Netflix in May 2019.

questions.question: The Mandalorian was the first original series released on Disney+ in 2019.
questions.explanation: 'The Mandalorian' was the flagship original series at Disney+'s launch in November 2019.

questions.question: How many Emmy Awards did ‘Fleabag’ win at the 2019 Primetime Emmy Awards?
questions.explanation: 'Fleabag' won six Emmys, including Outstanding Comedy Series and Lead Actress for Phoebe Waller-Bridge.

questions.question: Who played the title character in the 2019 Netflix series ‘The Witcher’?
questions.explanation: Henry Cavill starred as Geralt of Rivia in the fantasy series 'The Witcher.'

questions.question: What 2019 film is shown in this image?
questions.explanation: Jordan Peele’s horror film 'Us' was released in 2019 and became a cultural phenomenon.

rounds.theme_description: International news events and global happenings.

questions.question: Which European city’s iconic cathedral suffered a devastating fire in April 2019?
questions.explanation: The Notre Dame Cathedral in Paris was severely damaged by fire in April 2019.

questions.question: Who became the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom in July 2019?
questions.explanation: Boris Johnson succeeded Theresa May as UK Prime Minister in July 2019.

questions.question: In 2019, the Amazon rainforest experienced its lowest number of fires in a decade.
questions.explanation: 2019 saw a dramatic increase in Amazon rainforest fires, drawing global concern.

questions.question: How many days did the 2019 Hong Kong protests last, from June to December?
questions.explanation: The protests spanned roughly 200 days, making them one of the longest-running in Hong Kong’s history.

questions.question: Which country officially left the Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces Treaty with the United States in August 2019?
questions.explanation: Both the U.S. and Russia withdrew from the INF Treaty in 2019.

questions.question: What protest movement is shown in this image from 2019?
questions.explanation: The Yellow Vests movement in France continued to make headlines in 2019.

rounds.theme_description: Music hits, artists, and trends that defined 2019.

questions.question: Which song by Lil Nas X broke the record for longest-running number one on the Billboard Hot 100 in 2019?
questions.explanation: 'Old Town Road' spent 19 weeks at number one, a new record.

questions.question: Who won the Grammy for Album of the Year in 2019 (awarded in early 2020)?
questions.explanation: Billie Eilish’s 'When We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?' won Album of the Year.

questions.question: BTS became the first K-pop group to perform on Saturday Night Live in 2019.
questions.explanation: BTS made their SNL debut in April 2019.

questions.question: How many Grammy Awards did Billie Eilish win at the 2020 ceremony for her 2019 work?
questions.explanation: Billie Eilish won five major Grammys, including Album, Record, and Song of the Year.

questions.question: Which Spanish-language song by Rosalía won Best New Latin Artist at the 2019 MTV VMAs?
questions.explanation: 'Con Altura' by Rosalía and J Balvin was a major hit and won at the VMAs.

questions.question: Who is this artist holding multiple Grammy trophies in 2019?
questions.explanation: Billie Eilish dominated the 2020 Grammys for her 2019 album.

questions.question: Which country won the 2019 Cricket World Cup in a dramatic final decided by a Super Over?
questions.explanation: England won their first Cricket World Cup after a tie-breaking Super Over against New Zealand.

questions.question: Who was named NBA Finals MVP after leading the Toronto Raptors to their first championship in 2019?
questions.explanation: Kawhi Leonard was instrumental in the Raptors’ victory.

questions.question: The U.S. Women’s National Soccer Team won their third FIFA Women’s World Cup in 2019.
questions.explanation: 2019 marked their fourth World Cup win, not third.

questions.question: How many major golf championships had Tiger Woods won after his 2019 Masters victory?
questions.explanation: Tiger Woods’ 2019 Masters win was his 15th major title.

questions.question: Which tennis player won both the Australian Open and Wimbledon men’s singles titles in 2019?
questions.explanation: Djokovic won both tournaments in 2019.

questions.question: Who is this basketball player holding the NBA Finals MVP trophy in 2019?
questions.explanation: Leonard was the 2019 NBA Finals MVP for the Toronto Raptors.

rounds.theme_description: Scientific breakthroughs, tech launches, and discoveries.

questions.question: What astronomical object was imaged for the first time ever in April 2019, making global headlines?
questions.explanation: The Event Horizon Telescope captured the first image of a black hole in the galaxy M87.

questions.question: Which company became the world’s most valuable publicly traded company in 2019, briefly surpassing $1 trillion in market value?
questions.explanation: Saudi Aramco’s IPO made it the world’s most valuable company in December 2019.

questions.question: In 2019, Google announced the achievement of ‘quantum supremacy.’
questions.explanation: Google claimed its quantum computer performed a calculation faster than any classical computer.

questions.question: How many satellites did SpaceX launch in its first Starlink mission in May 2019?
questions.explanation: The first Starlink launch deployed 60 satellites.

questions.question: Which foldable smartphone, released in 2019, was delayed due to screen durability issues?
questions.explanation: The Galaxy Fold’s launch was postponed after early review units broke.

questions.question: What is this famous astronomical image from 2019?
questions.answer: First image of a black hole
questions.explanation: This is the first-ever image of a black hole, released in April 2019.

rounds.theme_description: Memes, social media trends, and internet phenomena.

questions.question: What simple photo became the most-liked Instagram post ever in January 2019, surpassing Kylie Jenner’s record?
questions.explanation: The ‘World Record Egg’ became a viral sensation, amassing over 50 million likes.

questions.question: Which viral challenge involved people dancing to Drake’s ‘In My Feelings’ outside moving cars, but was officially discouraged in 2019 due to safety concerns?
questions.explanation: The Kiki Challenge went viral but was criticized for its dangers.

questions.question: The ‘Storm Area 51’ Facebook event in 2019 resulted in thousands of people actually storming the military base.
questions.explanation: While millions RSVP’d, only a few showed up, and no one stormed the base.

questions.question: How many people marked themselves as ‘going’ to the ‘Storm Area 51’ event on Facebook?
questions.explanation: Over 2 million people RSVP’d to the viral event.

questions.question: Which app, popularized in 2019, uses AI to age or de-age users’ faces in photos?
questions.explanation: FaceApp’s aging filter went viral in 2019.

questions.question: What viral 2019 phenomenon is this image of a brown egg associated with?
questions.explanation: The egg became the most-liked Instagram post ever in 2019.

rounds.theme_description: Major movies, cinematic records, and film industry news.

questions.question: Which film became the highest-grossing movie of all time in 2019, surpassing ‘Avatar’?
questions.explanation: 'Avengers: Endgame' grossed over $2.7 billion worldwide.

questions.question: Who won the Academy Award for Best Director at the 2019 Oscars (for films released in 2018)?
questions.explanation: Cuarón won for 'Roma' at the 2019 Oscars.

questions.question: The 2019 film ‘Parasite’ was the first South Korean movie to win the Palme d’Or at Cannes.
questions.explanation: 'Parasite' made history at Cannes in 2019.

questions.question: How many Oscars did ‘Parasite’ win at the 2020 Academy Awards for its 2019 release?
questions.explanation: 'Parasite' won Best Picture, Director, Original Screenplay, and International Feature.

questions.question: Which animated film won the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature in 2019?
questions.explanation: The film won at the 2019 Oscars for 2018 releases.

questions.question: What film is shown in this image of superheroes and a purple-skinned villain?
questions.explanation: The film was the biggest box office hit of 2019.

rounds.theme_description: Influential figures, awards, and notable passings.

questions.question: Who was awarded the 2019 Nobel Peace Prize for efforts to resolve the border conflict with Eritrea?
questions.explanation: Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed won the Nobel Peace Prize in 2019.

questions.question: Which fashion designer, known for his work at Chanel, passed away in February 2019?
questions.explanation: Lagerfeld was a legendary figure in the fashion world.

questions.question: In 2019, Angela Merkel announced her resignation as Chancellor of Germany, effective immediately.
questions.explanation: Merkel announced she would not seek re-election, but did not resign in 2019.

questions.question: How many years had Emperor Akihito reigned before abdicating the Japanese throne in 2019?
questions.explanation: Akihito reigned from 1989 to 2019.

questions.question: Who became the first woman to win the Ballon d’Or Féminin (Women’s Ballon d’Or) in 2019?
questions.explanation: Rapinoe was honored for her achievements in women’s soccer.

questions.question: Who is this man holding a Nobel medal with an Ethiopian flag in the background?
questions.explanation: Ahmed received the Nobel Peace Prize in 2019.

rounds.theme_description: Social movements, activism, and cultural shifts.

questions.question: Which Swedish activist delivered a powerful speech at the UN Climate Action Summit in 2019, sparking global youth protests?
questions.explanation: Thunberg’s ‘How dare you?’ speech became a rallying cry for climate action.

questions.question: Which U.S. state became the first to ban the sale of new fur products in 2019?
questions.explanation: California passed the landmark law in October 2019.

questions.question: The ‘OK Boomer’ meme became a popular retort to dismiss out-of-touch attitudes in 2019.
questions.explanation: The phrase went viral as a generational catchphrase.

questions.question: How many countries participated in the Global Climate Strike in September 2019?
questions.explanation: Over 150 countries joined the climate protests.

questions.question: Which U.S. city hosted the first-ever WorldPride event in the United States in 2019?
questions.explanation: NYC hosted WorldPride to mark the 50th anniversary of Stonewall.

questions.question: Who is this young woman holding a ‘Skolstrejk för klimatet’ sign?
questions.explanation: Thunberg became the face of youth climate activism in 2019.

rounds.theme_description: Miscellaneous events, quirky facts, and surprising headlines from 2019.

questions.question: Which Japanese city hosted the G20 summit in June 2019?
questions.explanation: The G20 leaders met in Osaka, Japan, in June 2019.

questions.question: Which company’s CEO stepped down in 2019 after a scandal involving data privacy and security breaches?
questions.explanation: Google co-founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin stepped down from their roles at Alphabet in 2019.

questions.question: In 2019, the kilogram was redefined based on a physical object kept in France.
questions.explanation: The kilogram was redefined using fundamental constants, ending reliance on a physical object.

questions.question: How many years had it been since the last total solar eclipse visible from South America before the one in July 2019?
questions.explanation: The previous total solar eclipse visible from South America was in 1994.

questions.question: Which video game won Game of the Year at The Game Awards 2019?
questions.explanation: 'Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice' was awarded Game of the Year.

questions.question: What is the name of this 2019 video game featuring a samurai warrior?
questions.explanation: The game won top honors at The Game Awards 2019.
